text: McDevitt is an Irish surname. It is sometimes written as Mcdevitt or Macdevitt. Notable people with the surname include: *James McDevitt Magee (1877-1949), American politician *Chas McDevitt, British musician *Hugh McDevitt, Immunologist *Jack McDevitt, American science fiction author *John W. McDevitt, one of the Knights of Columbus *Ruth McDevitt, American film actress *Tom McDevitt, president of Washington Times ==See also== *Bishop McDevitt High School (Harrisburg, Pennsylvania), a school in the United States *Phelim Reagh MacDavitt, Irish warrior *Anthony McDevitt, Expert Tester (Euxton)
title: McDevitt
